Looks like a problem getting the display?   sending to platform....

This looks like a case where you are calling methods on MessageDialog from a thread other than the UI thread since I don't see a asyncExec or syncExec on the stack trace.

Moving back to Web Tools. Please reassign to Platform/UI if I am wrong and you are calling into MessageDialog from the UI thread.

Neeraj can you take a look?
